manufacturing.title: CNC Machining & Grinding
manufacturing.content:
We offer high quality machined parts at low cost and with short lead time. Our partners have highly qualified staff and state of the art machines.The machine park at our manufacturers includes:
• 3, 4 and 5 axis milling machines, 
• Bed mills, 
• Gantry mills, 
• Turning machines with Y-axis and a 360-degree B-axis, 
• CNC Grinding machines, 
• NC measurement machines, 

 We machine different type of materials:
• Steel, 
• Aluminium, 
• Copper, 
• Brass, 
• Aluminium bronze, 
• Stainless, 
• Plastic, 
• Cast materials,  

 We can also assemble parts before shipping.

manufacturing.title: Sheet Metal & Laser Cutting
manufacturing.content: We laser cut in most type of materials.There are many advantages to choosing laser cutting. Firstly, our laser cutters have high precision and provide fine and precise cuts in your material. With laser cutting, you can get both complicated patterns and straight lines. Because the laser beam is so thin, very little material is spilled. Materials that have been cut with a laser also do not need to be post-processed, which means that production is faster than with other methods.We provide laser cutting, bending, welding, riveting, coating  and assembling of sheet metal.Today we produce everything from shims for industrial fixtures to component plates for electrical cabinets.

manufacturing.title: Die Casting
manufacturing.content:
We offer high quality die casting parts and molds for different types of iron, aluminium and aluminium bronze.When it comes to aluminium we offer:
•Gravity casting,
• Low pressure casting,
• High pressure die casting,
• In most cases we also offer additional CNC machining of casted parts and molds.

manufacturing.title: Surface Treatment
manufacturing.content:
We carry out most types of surface treatment:
• Electric Galvanization,
• Hot dip galvanization,
• Anodizing in different colours,
• Manganese Phosphating,
• Black Oxidizing,
• AlCrN Top,
• And more

manufacturing.title: Hardening
manufacturing.content:
We harden and temper your products with following methods:
• Through hardening (neutral hardening),
• Case Hardening,
• Induction Hardening,
• Nitriding,
• And more.After hardening we can grind and machine parts to compensate for material deviations

manufacturing.title: Plastic injection
manufacturing.content: Menea AB is working with partners that are known for high level of molding expertise, development of plastic injecton tools and product development. We are a pride supplier of plastic parts to some of the world leading companies in different industries in Europe and USA.

manufacturing.title: Assembly
manufacturing.content: To reduce cost for assembly it is wise to make it in cost effective country like Bosnia & Herzegovina, Slovenia and Croatia.

manufacturing.title: Packaging & Logistics
manufacturing.content: Manufactured items are always carefully packed.They can also be packed and marked according to customers preference.We have local staff to monitor logistics.With our manufacturing in Bosnia-Herzegovina, Slovenia and Croatia we can offer much shorter shipping time to European countries than our oversea competitors, often to better quality and landed cost.Our main market is Scandinavia but today we also deliver to our customers subsidiaries in Brazil, USA, China and Balkan countries.

qa.title: QA
qa.content:
Our local staff monitor quality assurance, logistics and delivery time.Together with our partners we continuously analyse customer drawings and specifications. Every now and then we submit improvement proposals to our customers that can result in cost savings and/or increased product quality.We provide outturn samples and QA documentation (PPAP) that can include:
• Material certificate,
• Measurement protocol (Cp/Cpk analysis),
• Surface treatment certificate,
• D-Map,
• Control plan,
• Drawings with measurement specification,All of the measurement protocols include traceability  to produced parts.
